\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 98365}

\subsection*{Nightmares and Lucid Deaming}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Kagalive}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 6 g &  & Smarts - Phenibut & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 220.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Took 6 grams yesterday. Went to sleep several hours later and found it very hard to stay awake. Had several vivid intense nightmares followed by a good nice lucid dream.



The next morning I awoke at 5.30am still drunk and intoxicated.



Do not underestimate this powerful substance as it takes hours to kick in fully.
